A day-dreamer escapes his anonymous life by disappearing into a world of fantasies,
filled with heroism, romance and action. When his job along with that of his co-worker,
are threatened, he takes action in the real world, embarking on a global journey,
that turns into an adventure more extraordinary than anything he could have ever imagined.
